column4: I'm having an issue dual booting into windows due to this error from grub. "error: efi file not found". I used boot repair and this was the pastebin that it posted ->>>> http://paste.ubuntu.com/1326418/
Does anyone have experience with EFI partitions?
Have you perchance started a thread at the ubuntu forums?
I would there a number of daily users that can help, if you are not successful here. Daily weekdays anyway.
